detail_desc: Trousers in an airy viscose weave with a high, elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and wide, straight legs.
Fitted vest top in ribbed cotton jersey with a round neck.
Cotton jersey briefs.
Rugby shirt in soft jersey with a contrasting colour collar, concealed buttons at the top, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and slits in the sides.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Jacket in supersoft pile with buttons down the front and a hood with sewn-on ears at the top. Jersey lining.

Set with a jumper and pair of trousers in soft cotton. Fine-knit jumper with a sewn-in shirt collar, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers in a stretch weave with concealed, adjustable elastication at the waist, a fake fly with a button at the top, and fake side pockets.
Long-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey.
Short dungaree dress in imitation leather with adjustable straps that fasten with press-studs and a visible zip down the front. Lined at the top.
Calf-length, circular skirt in imitation leather with visible seams and a concealed zip in one side. High waist and a detachable belt with a covered buckle. Unlined.
Leather belt with a metal buckle. Width 2.5 cm.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Sandals in woven fabric with an adjustable, lightly padded hook and loop tab at the front and at the back of the heel. Moulded rubber soles, fluted underneath.
Short, wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short sleeves.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes with pendants in various designs. Diameter 2 cm and 1.5 cm.
Pyjamas with a short-sleeved top and pair of shorts in soft, patterned jersey. Top with an overlocked edge on the sleeves and at the hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist and overlocked hems.
Cap in woven fabric with a contrasting colour peak, appliqué on the front and adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Long cotton poplin shirt with a grandad collar, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with wide buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
T-shirts in organic cotton jersey.
Long jacket in a soft weave with notch lapels, flap welt front pockets, a gently tapered waist and long sleeves. No fasteners. Lined.
5-pocket skinny-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly.
TOCA LIFE x H&M. T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif, ribbing around the neckline and a small fabric appliqué just above the hem.
Fitted, calf-length dress in a soft rib knit with a round neckline and long sleeves.

Set with a T-shirt and denim shorts. T-shirt in soft, printed slub cotton jersey. 5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, reinforcement on the inside, an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button.
Alice band with decorations on top.
Hi-tops in imitation suede with imitation leather sections, and concealed elastic gore in the sides. Faux fur linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Cotton jersey vest tops in a narrow cut at the top with a flare top the hem. Rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in patterned cotton jersey.
Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, buttons at the front and welt front pockets with a flap. Lined in recycled polyester.
Fitted body in ribbed jersey with a shaped neckline, long sleeves and a lined gusset with concealed press-studs.
Football shirt in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif front and back. Short raglan sleeves ending in a double layer in a contrasting colour.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and press-studs at the crotch.
Lightly padded, quilted shopper in a recycled polyester weave with two handles and a zip at the top and one inner compartment. Lined. Height 28 cm. Width 45 cm.
Brogues in matt imitation leather with a decorative welt seam around the soles, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Twill linings and insoles and fluted soles.

Short dress in airy, textured-weave patterned chiffon with a flounce-trimmed V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front. Short sleeves with flounced trims, an elasticated seam at the waist and a flounce at the hem. Partly lined.
Fitted vest top in soft cotton jersey with lace trims around the neckline and armholes.
Hat in braided paper straw with an indented crown and wide grosgrain band. Width of brim 6.5 cm.
Printed swimming trunks with an elasticated, drawstring waist and lined front.
Brazilian briefs in jersey and lace with a low, V-shaped waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Off-the-shoulder top in soft jersey with an elasticated top edge, sleeves in woven fabric with broderie anglaise and a narrow tie under the bust.
Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front, two open chest pockets and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Dungarees in sweatshirt fabric made from soft organic cotton. Straps with press-studs, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the hems. Soft brushed inside.
High-waisted jersey leggings.

V-neck T-shirt in stretch cotton jersey with a double trim around the neckline and sleeves. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the physique. Narrow shoulders and gently tapered sleeves create a flattering silhouette.

Lightly padded jacket in wind- and water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, fleece-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Diagonal zip down the front and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Imitation suede sandals with a scalloped foot strap and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 8 cm.
Cropped halterneck top in soft, ribbed viscose jersey with a V-neck.
Three hair clips and two pairs of earrings in metal decorated with pearly plastic beads. Length of hair clips 7-8 cm, length of earrings 2 cm and 4.5 cm.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the jacket is organic.

Coat in a nylon and cotton weave with a tie belt at the waist, pointed collar and concealed buttons down the front. Long raglan sleeves and diagonal welt pockets with a flap. Single back vent. Unlined. The polyester content of the pocket lining is partly recycled.
Long-sleeved top in airy, ribbed, printed jersey.
Halterneck bralette in lace with triangular cups with removable inserts, a wide hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Set in soft cotton. Fine-knit romper suit with a frill trim at the top, narrow shoulder straps, buttons at the back, a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and ribbed hems. Long-sleeved top in jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder.

Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details and a lightly padded edge and tongue. Elasticated lacing at the front, a hook and loop tab at the top and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles, and chunky soles.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch cotton denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and raw-edge, frayed hems.

Long, double-breasted, straight-cut coat in a woven wool blend with notch lapels, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs. Chest pocket, jetted front pockets with a flap, and a single back vent. Lined.
Sarong in an airy weave. Size 130x150 cm.

Set with a hat, pair of mittens and tube scarf in a soft knit. Jersey-lined hat with a pompom on top, earflaps and ties underneath. Jersey-lined mittens (size 2-6M without thumbs) with foldover ribbing at the cuffs.
Top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neckline and long sleeves.
Wrapover top in jersey with a V-neck, seam and detachable tie belt at the waist and long, cuffed sleeves.
Straight-cut jersey T-shirt in a relaxed fit with a round neck.
Short, straight-cut dress in a sequined weave with a low V-neck at the back, shoulder pads and long sleeves. Lined.
Hat, mittens and tube scarf set in a soft jacquard knit. Hat with earflaps, a pompom on top and ties under the chin. Mittens with ribbed cuffs. Tube scarf with ribbed edges.
Long, straight-cut tunic in a crêpe weave with wide pin-tucks at the front, a V-neck and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Sleeveless dress in organic cotton jersey with a smocked seam at the waist and rounded hem.
Boxy jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with a lace panel down the sides and ties at the cuffs. Ribbing around the neckline and hem.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with creases, a regular waist, hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Dungaree shorts in soft, washed twill made from Tencel™ lyocell with embroidered appliqués at the front. Adjustable straps, two chest pockets, buttons at the sides and side pockets.
Cropped off-the-shoulder top in soft fabric with smocking at the top and hem, and long wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a high cut at the back.
Polo shirt in premium cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Henley top in jersey with a button placket and long sleeves with a tab and button.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Sandals in soft leather with narrow straps at the front and long, narrow straps that tie around the ankles. Leather insoles.
Joggers in soft cotton jersey with elasticated ribbing at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Dressing gown with a matching flannel in soft cotton terry. Dressing gown with a detachable tie belt at the waist, and a hood with ears and embroidery. Flannel in the shape of a mitten.
Sports top in sturdy jersey with long raglan sleeves, ventilating holes under the arms, seams at the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
